channel.title: Python on Adrian Brzoza
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Adrian Brzoza

item.title: DynamoDB Scan
item.description: When working with AWS DynamoDB I sometimes have to modify each document in table. Most of the times executing update statement is just not enough and i have to programmatically access each document and modify it.

item.title: Decorators in Python
item.description: Decorators are one of my favorite Python features. By using them we can alter functions and methods. From decorator we have access to method / function arguments as well as returned value. We don’t even have to execute decorated function.
